This notebook contains the information of the summary statistic used in this project. Including the links and the information on the traits (e.g., sample prevalence). It will be updated as soon as new studies are added. 


The path towards the munged studies (they have received some modification during the process)

When the sample prevalence is 0.5 means that we know the relative prevalence and it has been calculated. 
```{r}

            'outputs/version3/01_output_prepare-sumstats/Munged-Sumstats/celiac.sumstats.gz',
```
